nodes.text: Finn & Rey Escape! is a young readers storybook written by Michael Siglain and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press that adapts scenes from Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The the eight-by-eight inch book was published on December 18, 2015, comprises 32 pages, and includes stickers.
When Finn and Rey find themselves on the run, they must work together to escape from the evil First Order.
